notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: DP and CS designed the study. DP carried out fieldwork, composed the literature review, conducted qualitative and quantitative data analysis, and drafted the manuscript. CS assisted greatly in all stages of the study and supplemented the draft. PB assisted in fieldwork preparation and determination of the core group of the sample during a first preliminary visit on the island and supplemented the draft. MP conducted the identification of wild medicinal plant voucher specimens and supplemented the draft. The authors read and approved the final manuscript.
